content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position x=0-2)
Consists of two stone furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position(0,0) processing iron ore with coal fuel
- Furnace 2 at position(2,0) processing iron ore with coal fuel

### Copper Plate Production (Position x=4, y=4)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore with coal fuel

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Automated assembly line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at position(6.5,11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at position(7.5,11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine at position(9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5,11.5) moving finished products to output chest
- Output wooden chest at position(12.5,11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-26.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water from pump to boiler
- Boiler at position(-7.0,24.5)
- Steam pipe network connecting boiler to engine
- Steam engine at position(-2.5,24.5)
- Small electric poles distributing power

### Research Lab Setup (Position y=28.5-31.5)
Automated research facility:
- Lab at position(0.5,28.5)
- Burner inserter at position(0.5,30.5)
- Input chest at position(0.5,31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Crafting errors due to missing production facilities
- Cannot craft copper cables and automation science packs directly - these require assembling machines or furnaces
- Ensure proper production facilities are set up before attempting to craft items that require them

### Resource shortage errors
- Keep coal supplies stocked in boilers and burner inserters to prevent fuel shortages
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in all burner-powered entities

### Assembly line material shortages
- Electronic circuit production stalls due to missing copper cables
- Ensure steady supply of input materials to keep assembly lines running efficiently
